subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: A 6-foot-4 guard with a unique game, Jones seldom attempts a jump shot. Instead, he relies on teardrop, scoop and push shots, mostly within 10 feet of the rim.
snippet: A 6-foot-4 guard with a unique game, Jones seldom attempts a jump shot. Instead, he relies on teardrop, scoop and push shots, mostly within 10 feet of the rim.
